document.full_text: carlos beltran ended a 17-game streak without a home run, hitting a three-run shot, as the mets rallied from a 7-0 deficit.
document.title: mets 9, pirates 8: mets show they got message, rallying from 7-0 deficit
lines_and_colors: carlos beltran ended a 17-game streak without a home run, hitting a three-run shot, as the mets rallied from a 7-0 deficit.
